com.davidsoergel.dsutils

Interface GenericFactoryAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericFactoryAware

    public interface GenericFactoryAware
    Marks a class for which instances keep track of the factory that produced them. This is useful for cases when the instances need to create additional instances using the same factory.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Soergel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GenericFactory getFactory()
      Returns the factory that produced this object.
      void setFactory(GenericFactory f)
      Sets the factory that produced this object.

    • Method Detail

      • getFactory

        @NotNull
GenericFactory getFactory()
        Returns the factory that produced this object. This is useful because the factory may have some configuration parameters, and we may want to construct a new object using the same parameters.
        Returns:

      • setFactory

        void setFactory(GenericFactory f)
        Sets the factory that produced this object.
        Parameters:
        f - the factory
